data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Matt is a maid, and he works in a hotel downtown. He ____ all ____ cleaning ____, ____ as ____ as 100! He ____ the ____ and ____, ____ cleans ____ bathroom. He also vacuums the floor and makes the bed.
data.partBlankContent: Matt is a maid, and he works in a hotel downtown. He spe___ all d__ cleaning ro___, some_____ as ma__ as 100! He was___ the she___ and tow___, a__ cleans t__ bathroom. He also vacuums the floor and makes the bed.
data.answer: 马特是一名女佣，他在市中心的一家酒店工作。他整天都在打扫房间，有时多达100个!他洗床单和毛巾，打扫浴室。他还用吸尘器打扫地板和铺床。
